data.title: Great place to stay
data.text: We had a great stay at this location,clean rooms , comfortable beds.quiet no hallway or road noise.breakfast was the normal comfort inn there was lots of hot food ,Staff was very helpful and friendly. We would stay again. Downside is it's always from the city but the stay overcame that

data.title: The Best Hotel In Spokane!
data.text: The is one of my all time favorite hotels! I travel a lot for business and a big part of my year is spent in hotels. There are certain things that I look for in a hotel. Number one is the service! When I made the call  to this fine hotel I was treated like family from the start. Earning status when traveling a lot is a big deal to me and I expect to be treated great. This hotel is amazing! 24 hour business center and 24 hour swimming pool that you can see from the lobby. Sunday -Thursday they serve soup and everyday they service fresh cookies! A full breakfast is served 7 days a week from 630am till 930am. Free wifi! The lobby is massive! Breakfast is served in the lobby. They have Directv so you get all of your favorite shows early. This is a smoke free hotel. I am so glad! I highly recommend this great hotel!

data.title: great over all
data.text: working in a hotel myslef, i look at things most guest wouldnt look at. Just from my room alone, I could tell that this hotel needs a new maintenance person and someone behind the housekeepers to inspect the rooms. My bathroom had hair all over the floor and tub. And the floor needs to be shampooed and vacuumed better. The thing that reawlly made this hotel worth it, was the staff. those two guys at night are great and quick at check in and the breakfast was a true breakfast buffet.

data.title: Great place to stay.
data.text: This is one of our favorite places to stay when we are in the Spokane area.  It is always a warm and welcoming place to stay.  The rooms are clean and comfortable, the breakfast is great and plentiful with many choices.  The cookies are fresh and delicious in the evening, the pool and spa areas are always clean and have plenty of towels, and the front desk staff is always caring, welcoming, and professional.  We know that we will return on our next trip to Spokane.

data.title: Quite Happy
data.text:
We recently stayed here for 4 nights in a king suite. The staff were helpful in getting me the best rate when I called ahead of time.  Staff were also helpful and friendly with all interactions at the hotel.  Sunday - Thursday soup is served and cookies are available daily after 5 p.m.  The breakfast area is fairly open and well set up with a wide selection of items, but can get busy at certain times. It was wonderful having iced lemon water available every day and tea and coffee available all day!
Rooms were well maintained and laid out.  The sink is outside of the bathroom.  The hot water seems to come with a squeal, unfortunately.  Most of my showers were spent listening to the whine of the hot water.  I'm not sure what causes this or what can be done to solve it. Also, we had a room with an door to an adjoining room and could hear the infant next door cry throughout the night two nights of our stay.  Generally it didn't keep us up, but we felt sorry for the young parents.  :-)
Internet speeds were fast. Parking was easy. Location was good, with restaurants within walking distance and a mall close by. We would stay here again, if we're in the area.  It was a nice location between Coeur d'Alene and Spokane.

data.title: Easy access of the southside of I-90
data.text:
Parking area a little tight.  

The staff was friendly.  

Our room was nice.  

They have a two story swimming pool area.  

At night they have free cookies that were quite popular.  

For breakfast the dining area can get a little crowded.

data.title: Really happy with our two night stay
data.text: We have nothing bad to say about our two night stay here in September 2016.  The room was big and clean.  The bed was comfortable.  The hotel was quite.  Nice big breakfast area with lots of choices.  Cookies in the evening.  Excellent value for our money!

data.title: Very nice room
data.text:
The room was extremely clean and large.  Good location with easy on and off the highway. Very friendly and helpful staff.

The breakfast was fair, eggs were wet, and bacon was as thin as tissue paper.  My wife tried a waffle and after two bits, stopped.

I do think selling coffee in an automatic coffee machine is very tacky.

data.title: Great Location, People and facilities
data.text: This hotel is nestled into a mountain overlooking Spokane Valley. The staff were friendly and gave us a tourist map to find our way around,  After checking in, we drove back a couple miles to the Spokane Valley Mall to get some exercise and eat at the food court. That was handy. Our room is spacious, quiet, comfortable and down the hall from the guest laundry, that we used. The pool is huge and clean as is the workout room. This is a great location right off I-90 and for shopping. And, the best part, reasonably priced. We had a great stay.

data.title: Travel to Ronan
data.text:
Very nice service on a travel stop. Great service good people. This was at the end of a protracted trip & was a welcome break.

Breakfast was great as was the pool & hot tub. I would recommend this for a couple of days.

data.title: Excellent Hotel!
data.text:
I'm hesitant to provide a review, as I hope that with all the positive reviews this hotel should receive, the next time we want to stay there----there will be no room available!
The hotel was an extraordinary surprise.  We thought that it might be between a 2 and a 3 rating when we reserved the room.  We couldn't have been more off base!  This hotel is triple excellent and a 5+.  The rooms are clean, the hotel is newer, the rooms were quiet, the carpets are clean, the beds are wonderfully comfortable, the staff is welcoming and pleasant, the breakfast is terrific, the seating for the breakfast is terrific.  Stay here!  You will feel as if you have been welcomed at a 5 star hotel!   Just don't stay there when we want to!    :)

data.title: The best so far
data.text: As a choice hotel member I've stayed in a number of their hotels and this by far has been the best. From the staff accommodating a special request, the spacious room and the best breakfast we've encountered from choice hotels, we will definitely keep this one on our list should we be in the Spokane area.

data.title: Best places I've stayed at in 2 weeks. My bed was amazing!
data.text:
I booked this last minute. Never stayed at this chain before. It was wonderful! I didn't want to leave the bed. It was so soft and comfy.   Plus free cookies and milk. And a keurig in the room! 
Friendly staff. Clean and quiet unless your facing the freeway, but duh.

data.title: Outstanding place to stay
data.text: Have stayed here twice. Staff is grateful. Room has best beds we have slept in without exception. Breakfast is cooked fresh with good coffee. And they gave us a coupon for a great dinner at a reasonably priced restaurant that serves wonderful meals.

data.title: Surprisingly nice for the great price
data.text:
We recently stayed here for a local soccer tournament my son was playing in and were so pleasantly surprised by the quality of this budget hotel. The rooms were very clean and tastefully decorated in relaxing earth tones. The beds were comfortable and staff was helpful. The free breakfast was standard. If they found a way to make that just a small cut above, they would really separate themselves from the competition. Still, as is it was a breath of fresh air from the usual team accommodations.  
Thanks!
Brandy Garton

data.title: First Stop on our 2 week vacation
data.text:
Our room was large, clean, and inviting. Our bed was great and we left well rested. 
Breakfast was good too. Great selections of fruit, cereals, waffles and pastry. Coffee was great. So nice to be able to have breakfast at the hotel instead of going out somewhere.

data.title: Fabulous Hotel an great location
data.text: Great hotel and very clean.  Very friendly staff at check in and helpful in getting our room.  Explained all the amenities to us and times for breakfast in the morning,   Room worked out perfectly for my disabled husband.  Breakfast choices in the morning were awesome and had coffee and tea.  We even had bacon and they had the waffle maker.  Plenty of parking and convenient to many restaurants and easy on and off from expressway.  Cookies in the evening too...and best of all very comfortable bed....

data.title: Spent one night.
data.text: Our room was very nice, but we were in the 100's and basically our room was in the basement -- with full windows facing a slope dug-out to accommodate the building...it was okay yet would have been nicer to have a view as the property is set up on a hill with spectacular views.  So, # 1  Next time we stay (which we will as the accommodations were great) we will ask to be on the 200 floor or above, and # 2 wish there was a fan in our bathroom.  The breakfast room was fabulous with everything from waffles to bagels (toast, hash browns, ham, biscuits & gravy, hard boiled eggs, yogurt, fruit, cereal, milk, juice, coffee, tea.. . ).

data.title: Very clean, well maintained,  and nice amenities!
data.text: Clean, well maintained and offered nice amenities.  Breakfast offered many options and was kept stocked with various foods. This motel was pleasant inside and out. We enjoyed a quiet atmosphere,  smelled clean- looked fresh and clean, and had the extra little options that made staying away from the conveniences of home less inconvenient!  Didn't get to go swimming,  but the pool looked nice and larger than many motel pools, in a pretty atrium. I will definitely stay at this location again when traveling to this area. Price was comparable to other motels in the area, but offered better value!

data.title: Spokane valley
data.text: Quiet location, nice room, clean, good breakfast, friendly staff.  There are Keurig coffee makers, microwave and fridge in the rooms, free wi-fi.  Breakfast had a large choice of hot and cold items.  Swimming pool looked nice, we didn't use it.
